people_also_ask.heading: A Lumbar Support Pillow is a light and portable pillow made of memory foam. It is ergonomically designed to provide maximum support of the spine, relieving pressure and helping to improve a user's posture or solve musculoskeletal conditions.29-Apr-2020

people_also_ask.question: Are lumbar cushions good for your back?
